MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH9 postcode area of Edinburgh affecting properties in Dumbiedykes Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.43am. Our engineers are on their way to Dumbiedykes Road substation to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.09am on Tuesday 17th November 2020.
